node.statement: Verify all mathematical claims in 'On the (Fib x Fib) ⋊ S_2 fusion category' (arXiv:2602.06117) by Ferragatta & van Rees. The paper computes the tube algebra representations, minimal central idempotents, lasso maps, and the 22-by-22 modular S matrix for the fusion category (Fib x Fib) ⋊ S_2. We verify: (1) Fibonacci F-symbols, (2) tube algebra structure constants, (3) all irreducible representations in each twisted Hilbert space, (4) all minimal central idempotents, (5) inter-Hilbert-space lasso maps, (6) Drinfeld center identification, (7) the 22-by-22 modular S and T matrices, (8) consistency: S^2=C, (ST)^3=C. Each claim is verified both algebraically and numerically (using TensorCategories.jl).
